name: NFL QB Shootout
description:
The Quarterback has long been an emblem of leadership, talent and poise. It's the most important, prominent and revered position in sports... and it's also the most challenging and difficult-to-master. Are you ready to prove your football throwing prowess in the ultimate test of pinpoint accuracy and precise timing?

The NFL, Skillz and Play Mechanix are proud to present NFL QB Shootout. Quarterback your favorite NFL team to victory against players from around the world and win cash prizes anytime, anywhere!

HOW TO PLAY NFL QB SHOOTOUT

- Choose which of the 32 NFL franchises you'd like to represent on the field.
- Select a game mode to challenge an opponent for either virtual currency or cash.
- Every match consists of a total of six plays.
- Each play has multiple routes. Tap the wide receiver with your preferred route to begin the play.
- Tap and hold to start your throwing motion. Drag to adjust your aim. Release to pass the ball!
- Remember to lead your pass. Throw the ball to the target area in front of the wide receiver.
- Complete passes to score points! The score of each pass is determined by Distance x Precision.
- The longer and more accurate the pass, the more points you will score!
- A pass with maximum accuracy receives a Perfect Pass Bonus!
- Avoid the defense! Interceptions result in point penalties.
- Don't wait too long to throw the ball, or you will be sacked.
- Hit multiple passes in a row to build a Completion Streak and score extra points!
- Complete all six pass attempts to achieve a Touchdown Bonus!
- Score more points than your opponent to win the match and take home the prize on the line.
- You will earn coins based upon your success. Spend your coins in the Equipment Manager to unlock fun upgrades!

Skillz is a powerful mobile competition platform that features matchmaking, tournaments, events, leaderboards, trophies, prizes, chat rooms and a rewarding player loyalty program. Please note that cash matches are not available in the following states: AR, AZ, CT, DE, LA, MT, SC, SD and TN. If you do not live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play NFL QB Shootout with virtual currency.

NFL QB Shootout undergoes frequent software updates, so keep an eye out for fresh new content coming often. If you have any questions or feedback about the game, feel free to reach out to Play Mechanix at mobilesupport@playmechanix.com. If you have any questions or feedback about the Skillz platform or cash matches, please contact support@skillz.com.
